channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 4 - Directory Services Overview Directory Service Store and Retrieve Information Multiple Types Users Groups Systems Resources Image Source: Wikipedia History 1988- X.500 Standard Published 1992 - Samba Released 1993 - Novell Directory Services 1993 - Kerberos Protocol 1999 - Microsoft Active Directory X.500 Standard Released in 1988 Name Lookups for X.400 Email Standards Built for OSI Networking Protocols Defines Several Protocols Directory Access Protocol (DAP) Directory System Protocol (DSP) Directory Information Shadowing Protocol (DISP) Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) Implementation of X.
